description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $292.7K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with WESTJET. The average
  contract duration was 0.32 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $2.9M. The longest
  contract was 0.53 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $8.0M.
